data.title: StumbleUpon
data.meta_description: StumbleUpon - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. r eb ou W y e g th ) in s r s on ve r o Up co ac le is ts b D s m r e Stu te ( in COL-270-504 Hessa Al-Eassa - 201012770 Jawaher Jasim - 200808440

2. List of content • Definition • How to setup an account • How to add your interest • How to Discover a new site • How to like or dislike a site • How to stumble through related pages? • How to stumble through a specific channel or interest? • How can you share content with friends? • Conclusion • Reference

3. Definition • Stumbleupon was founded in November 2001 by Garret Camp, Geoff Smith, Eric Boyd and Justin LaFrance. • "StumbleUpon” discovers web sites based on your interests, learns what you like and brings you more." Basically, it is a way to discover new sites and blogs.

4. Video Check this out!! This video will explain more about StumbleUpon… HOME

5. How to setup an account 1) Visit http://www.stumbleupon.com • Click on the large yellow button inviting you to join. • You can then sign up by filling out the registration form. • Submit your registration form by clicking the “Sign Up” button. • You now have a StumbleUpon account!

6. 1 3 2 4 HOME

7. How to add your interest?? • Go to the “Discover” page. • Select the “Interests” tab on the left hand panel. • Browse the available Interests via the thumbnails displayed or by exploring the dropdown menu to show more Interests • You can also enter a specific Interest or keyword into the Explore Box to find an Interest you’d like to follow. • Click the link that reads “FOLLOW” next to an Interest to add it to your current Interests. HOME

8. 1 2 3 HOME

9. How to Discover a new site?? Simply, click on this button to discover a new site !!! HOME

10. How to like or dislike a site • Visit a Stumbleupon page. In the StumbleBar, you will find the “Like” or “Dislike” button. • Click the “Like” or “Dislike” button once so it should be green, indicating that you’ve already given your feedback about this web page. HOME

11. Pictures HOME

12. H o to stu ble w m thro gh re d u late pages? Just by typing in the “Explore an interest” box you can stumble through related web pages very easily! HOME

13. Why don’t you try it? Click on this Link http://www.stumbleupon.com/about HOME

14. How to stumble through a specific interest or channel? Very simple! 1) Click on discover 2) Click on channel 3) Follow the channel that you like HOME

15. 1 2 3 HOME

16. How can you share content with friends? • Click on share • Add an email or StumbleUpon username • Write a message • Post on social networking sites! • Send HOME

17. Conclusion If you are a person who Loves to explore and surf the web, then you must join “Stumble Upon”! 3.Search for your interests 4.Share things that you like 5.And fall in love with “Stumble Upon”! It’s very simple to setup an account! Just follow our steps and enjoy the fun of this site! HOME
